About.title: About MITRI Law Office
About.subtitle: Trusted legal expertise in Commercial Law and Intellectual Property since establishment.
About.storyContent: MITRI IP & Law Office, led by Attorney Ghayth G. MITRI, is a premier law firm specializing in Commercial & Corporate Law and Intellectual Property. Based in Damascus, Syria, we provide comprehensive legal services to businesses and individuals, combining deep legal expertise with practical business understanding.
About.missionText: To provide exceptional legal services that protect our clients' rights, business interests, and intellectual property while maintaining the highest standards of professional ethics and integrity.

values.title: Our Values
values.innovationDesc: Delivering the highest quality legal services.
values.excellenceDesc: Upholding ethical standards in all we do.
values.partnershipDesc: Committed to achieving the best outcomes.

HomeCTA.title: Protect Your Business & Ideas
HomeCTA.subtitle: Get expert legal counsel for your commercial matters and intellectual property protection.
